rules.name: ResourceFileUsage
rules.description: All user-facing strings must be stored in resource files, not hardcoded.

rules.name: EnglishDefault
rules.description: English must be the default language for resources.

rules.name: TurkishTranslationRequired
rules.description: Every English resource string must have a Turkish translation.

rules.name: CultureAwareFormatting
rules.description: Dates, times, numbers, and currencies must use culture-aware formatting APIs.

rules.name: FallbackLanguage
rules.description: If a translation is missing, fallback to English.
